summary:
I am a computer engineer with master's degree, an experienced developer working with Microsoft stack techonologies such as Azure App Services and Azure Kubernetes using C#.

In addition to my software development skills, I have good communication skills which helps minimizing overheads and maximizing time efficiency. I'm a certified Scrum-Master. 

Prior to my recent years of experience working in Netherlands, I had significant amount of face-to-face customer attraction in many projects including the Command & Control system which was developed for NATO where I supported execution of operation exercises and instructed training sessions in various premises located in Europe.

In accordance with my professional duties, I make speeches, record how-to videos and publish open-source code-bases for sharing my experiences and influencing younger engineers.
